title: Still Can't Spectate Sona
body:
Title. 
This is especially bad cause I help spectate and take notes for my friends' 5 man ranked attempts, and if they or the enemy pick Sona then I'm screwed.

replies.body: She doesn't like to be creeped on.
We're still working on a fix for this one.
Thank you for the info! Just wanted an update to make sure I wasn't the only one having an issue.
